content: a slight twist on the classic granny square motif forms the basis for this unstructured cardigan that s ready for cool autumn days featuring expertly curated tones of caron x pantone bamboo the distinctive design has tons of color play potential to spark your creativity crochet as shown or choose another multi-shade option to finish this bold addition to your everyday wardrobe sizing to fit bust measurement xs/s/m/l 28-42 71-106 5 cm xl/2/3xl/4/5xl 44-62 112-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s/m/l 50 127 cm xl/2/3/4/5xl 70 178 cm
